entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy, mentioned as someone who has been talking to Fudge and giving generously to various things.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Minister of Magic, mentioned as meeting Death Eaters like Malfoy.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, mentioned in the conversation with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley, mentioned as being concerned about Fudge's meetings with Death Eaters.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore, mentioned as thinking that Fudge is acting of his own accord.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who are followers of Lord Voldemort, mentioned as meeting with Fudge.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley mentions that Malfoy is well-connected and uses this connection to ask favors and delay laws.
Fudge is meeting Death Eaters like Malfoy, which raises concerns about his safety.
Mr. Weasley is concerned about Fudge's meetings with Death Eaters and asks Harry for his thoughts on the matter.
Dumbledore believes that Fudge is acting of his own accord, which provides little comfort.
